Class SdServer

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, ComponentCallbacks2

    public class SdServer
extends Service
    Based on example at: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/14309256/using-nanohttpd-in-android and http://developer.android.com/guide/components/services.html#ExtendingService

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SdServer.SdBinder
      class to handle binding the MainApp activity to this service so it can access sdData.
      private class  SdServer.WebServer
      Class describing the seizure detector web server - appears on port 8080.

        public void getPebbleStatus()
